<div class="content-narrow">

We welcome comments, suggestions, and revisions to improve the protocol, and encourage more members of the herbarium community to join **IHerbSpec**.  

To get in touch, please use the form below. Your message will be delivered securely to the working group coordinators.  

You may also engage with IHerbSpec through our public communication channels:

- **GitHub Discussions** (questions, ideas, and public dialogue):  
[https://github.com/IHerbSpec/iherbspec.github.io/discussions](https://github.com/IHerbSpec/iherbspec.github.io/discussions)  

- **IHerbSpec-all Google Group** (announcements and community updates):   
[https://groups.google.com/u/4/a/g.harvard.edu/g/iherbspec-all](https://groups.google.com/u/4/a/g.harvard.edu/g/iherbspec-all)  

- **IHerbSpec-Protocol Google Group** (protocol discussion and governance):  
[https://groups.google.com/u/4/a/g.harvard.edu/g/iherbspec-protocol](https://groups.google.com/u/4/a/g.harvard.edu/g/iherbspec-protocol)

</div>
:::

<div class="contact-form">

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/mqadrbwo" method="POST">
  <label>
    Your Name:
    <input type="text" name="name" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Your Email:
    <input type="email" name="_replyto" required>
  </label>

  <label>
    Message:
    <textarea name="message" rows="6" required></textarea>
  </label>

  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>

</div>
